title: Mulligan, Mumford welcome first child
text:
Email a friend 
CAREY Mulligan and Marcus Mumford have welcomed their first child together. 
E! News reports the British actress “has given birth to a healthy and happy baby,” and on Wednesday night she stepped out for the first time since becoming a mother at the London premiere of her new film Suffragette , also starring Meryl Streep and Helena Bonham Carter. 
Mulligan, 30, and Mumford, 28, the lead singer of folk band Mumford & Sons, only revealed their pregnancy in April. 
The famously private stars have known each other since childhood and started dating in 2011 before quietly tying the knot in April 2012. 
“She is just enjoying this time with her family and close friends,” a source told E! News. Mulligan reportedly gave birth in September. Source: AFP Carey Mulligan attends the Suffragette premiere in London. Source: Getty Images 
The mum-to-be managed to keep her growing baby bump concealed in a structured gown while arriving to the Tony Awards back in June, where she was nominated for best performance by an actress in a leading role in a play for Skylight . 
A source told US Weekly at the time: “They weren’t planning on announcing, but she hasn’t stopped working. Everybody around her is being very supportive. The show ends soon and they’re going back to England after.” 
Mumford’s Grammy-winning band is scheduled to resume its worldwide tour in November and will head to Australia for a handful of shows. 
Suffragette hits cinemas in Australia on Boxing Day. Carey Mulligan attends the 2015 Tony Awards. Source: Getty Images 
Suffragette hits cinemas in Australia on Boxing Day. Carey Mulligan and husband Marcus Mumford. Source: news.com.au
